## IIdentifier interface

Identifier interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IIdentifier
```

## Properties

| Property                                                  | Type                                | Description                                                                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [alias?](./core.iidentifier.alias.md)                     | string                              | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Identifier alias. Can be used to reference an object in an external system |
| [controllerKeyId?](./core.iidentifier.controllerkeyid.md) | string                              | <i>(Optional)</i> Controller key id                                                                    |
| [did](./core.iidentifier.did.md)                          | string                              | Decentralized identifier                                                                               |
